reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count SOOAE {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Great stocking stuffer! Womens’ Metallic Finish Non Slip Grip 48 Counts 2 Inches Hair Bobby Pins Gray DARONGFENG {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.61 x 2.52 x 0.35 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '788465401296'} Good quality bobby pins that hold really well. I haven't seen the gray color in stores so it was really nice that you could order this color on Amazon. Great bobby pins, Love that you can get them in the gray color!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Strong inclination towards gel nail products with multiple color options, alongside a growing interest in skincare products like masks. Recently displayed an interest in hair accessories, particularly bobby pins in unique colors. 
- **Quality Focus:** Values high-quality, long-lasting items in both nail and skincare products, with a commitment to non-toxic and cruelty-free options. Demonstrates a discerning taste for functional hair accessories. 
- **Purchase Behavior:** Engages in thoughtful purchasing, seeking thorough product understanding before buying. Actively acquires additional items to enhance overall beauty routines, including gifts for family members. 
- **Color Aesthetic:** Enjoys vibrant and varied color palettes, specifically favors unique shades, as shown in the recent choice of hair accessories.
- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Shows enthusiasm for home nail care and DIY manicure kits, alongside an emerging interest in at-home skincare and hair care routines, emphasizing a hands-on beauty approach.
- **Packaging Preference:** Appreciates practical features, including effective packaging for beauty products and organization tools.
- **Review Engagement:** Willing to leave detailed feedback based on hands-on experiences, reflecting a desire to share knowledge and assist others in their purchasing decisions.

Overall, the user exhibits a balanced approach, prioritizing quality and practicality in beauty and skincare, while exploring new areas like hair accessories, maintaining a vibrant and colorful aesthetic.
